abstract: Bank of America has agreed to buy back $43 million in auction-rate securities from the Massachusetts Turnpike Authority and the Massachusetts Housing Partnership, as part of its ongoing negotiations with the Massachusetts Securities Division, both agencies confirmed Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America has agreed to buy back $43 million in auction-rate securities from the Massachusetts Turnpike Authority and the Massachusetts Housing Partnership, as part of its ongoing negotiations with the Massachusetts Securities Division, both agencies confirmed Wednesday.

headline.main: Bank of America to Buy Back $43 Million in Auction-Rate Securities
